rules.description: Mouse Buttons to Close Tab, Back, and Forward
Change caps_lock to right cmd+ctrl+opt+shift. Change caps_lock to escape when pressed alone.
Global arrow keys on hyper+hjkl
Change hyper+< to focus next window default macos shortcut
Toggle Karabiner profiles with hyper+^ and hyper+esc

to.shell_command: '/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'fertigt_numpad' && osascript -e 'display notification "fertigt_numpad" with title "Switch Karabiner Profile"'

'/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'fertigt_default' && osascript -e 'display notification "fertigt_default" with title "Switch Karabiner Profile"'

'/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'fertigt_numpad' && osascript -e 'display notification "fertigt_numpad" with title "Switch Karabiner Profile"'

'/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'fertigt_default' && osascript -e 'display notification "fertigt_default" with title "Switch Karabiner Profile"'
'/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'fertigt_off' && osascript -e 'display notification "fertigt_off" with title "Switch Karabiner Profile"'

'/Library/Application Support/org.pqrs/Karabiner-Elements/bin/karabiner_cli' --select-profile 'fertigt_default' && osascript -e 'display notification "fertigt_default" with title "Switch Karabiner Profile"'

rules.description: Switch numbers and symbols; ยง to @; ( to <; ) to >
Change shift, command, option, left control, and fn if pressed alone
Switch # to ; and < to #; and right_option+L to paragraph
